title: Review: Off Broadway, Jim Parsons Meets the Small Bang Theory
description: In a revival of the 2002 musical “A Man of No Importance,” the star of “The Big Bang Theory” achieves something more delicate.
dc:creator: Jesse Green
media:description: Jim Parsons, center. After 12 seasons of “The Big Bang Theory,” he knows not only what marks to hit but exactly how to hit them.
